code:
flowchart TD
    subgraph CRUD
        Create[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        Read[FinTech_AuthVault]
        Update[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        Delete[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    end

    subgraph Construction
        constructResource[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        constructSettings[FinTech_AuthVault]
        constructAssignment[FinTech_LedgerService]
    end

    subgraph StateMapping
        mapRemoteState[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        mapSettingsState[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        mapAssignmentState[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    end

    subgraph Model
        ResourceModel[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        AssignmentModel[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        SettingsModel[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    end

    %% CRUD to Construction
    Create --> constructResource
    Update --> constructResource
    Create --> constructAssignment
    Update --> constructAssignment

    %% CRUD to State Mapping
    Read --> mapRemoteState
    Read --> mapSettingsState
    Read --> mapAssignmentState

    %% Construction to Model
    constructResource --> ResourceModel
    constructSettings --> SettingsModel
    constructAssignment --> AssignmentModel

    %% State Mapping to Model
    mapRemoteState --> ResourceModel
    mapSettingsState --> SettingsModel
    mapAssignmentState --> AssignmentModel

    %% CRUD relationships
    Create --> Read
    Update --> Read
    Delete --> Read
